data: Broome’s Point | Pocomico River | Chesapeake Bay
Broome’s Point | Pocomico River mouth | Chesapeake Bay
Broome’s Point proper is a crescent-shaped spit of sand separating the mouth of the Pocomico River from the waters of Chesapeake Bay.
